name: uptimeflare-aws
description: AWS Lambda-based uptime monitoring with multi-region support

scripts.build: npm run build:checker && npm run build:aggregator && npm run build:api
scripts.build:checker: cd lambdas/checker && npm install && npm run build && npm run package
scripts.build:aggregator: cd lambdas/aggregator && npm install && npm run build && npm run package
scripts.build:api: cd lambdas/api && npm install && npm run build && npm run package
scripts.deploy:plan: cd terraform && terraform init && terraform plan
